results.title: Karnataka Gears Up for Bengaluru Tech Summit 2025
results.summary: Karnataka is preparing for the Bengaluru Tech Summit (BTS) 2025, emphasizing global innovation with attendees from over 60 countries. The summit aims to explore themes like AI, digital health, and climate tech. results.title: ISRO Chief Unveils Bold Plans at IIITDM Event
results.summary: ISRO Chairman Dr. V Narayanan announced India's plans to build a space station by 2035 and send astronauts to the moon by 2040. He urged youth to be innovative and align scientific progress with rural development. The article highlights India's advancements in science, technology, agriculture, and healthcare, expressing confidence in becoming a global technological frontrunner by 2047. results.title: STEM Professionals Denounce Poor Support, Backwards Policies Under Marcos Jr.
results.summary: An article from the Philippine Collegian reports on a STEM forum where professionals criticized the Marcos Jr. administration's handling of science and technology. The approved budget for the Department of Science and Technology was significantly lower than requested, impacting disaster risk reduction. Concerns were raised about the overreliance on high-tech imports rather than local research and development. Poor working conditions and delayed wages contribute to brain drain. The article highlights the importance of investing in local industries and supporting scientists to address community issues. "If we actually organize and move together as a group and call for action, we have a better chance of making what we want a reality."
